caption.p: Fresh weight and dry weight of P. bullata callus grown on MS medium at different concentrations of ( a, b) α-naphthaleneacetic acid (NAA), ( c, d) indole-3-butyric acid (IBA), ( e, f) indole-3-acetic acid (IAA), ( g, h) 2,4-D, ( i, j) picloram, and ( k, l) dicamba. Data represented as means ± SE. The asterisk (*) represents a significant difference of treated callus with 1-week old callus grown on MS basal media without auxins (MSO) at p ≤ 0.05 Tukey’s range test.
